1346112838896030923.Text: I found Mossanon in Sadrith Mora and confronted him about the embezzled funds. He admitted his crime, and offered to return 2500 gold -- he had spent the rest -- and pay back the rest as soon as he could, if I'd promise to keep his whereabouts secret from Canctunian Ponius. I promised to keep his secret, but I think he suspected I would not honor my promise, and he refused to return the gold.

26292218251176221009.Text: I found Mossanon in Sadrith Mora and confronted him about the embezzled funds. He admitted his crime, and offered to return 2500 gold -- he had spent the rest -- and pay back the rest as soon as he could, if I'd promise to keep his whereabouts secret from Canctunian Ponius. I promised to keep his secret. My earnest promise persuaded him to trust me, and he yielded the 2500 gold to me.

481315635271536050.Text: Imperial Cult: Pledge from Canctunian Ponius
